mapper.select: SELECT specific_item_code, h_item_code, head_buy_date, head_staff_id, head_stock_regit_date, head_stock_item_out, head_stock_in_date, head_stock_in_expiry_date, head_stock_in_expiry_date, head_stock_return FROM head_stock WHERE specific_item_code = #{stock.specificItemCode}

SELECT specific_item_code FROM head_stock WHERE head_stock_item_out = 'N' AND h_item_code = (SELECT h_item_code FROM head_item WHERE inte_code = #{inteCode}) ORDER BY head_stock_in_expiry_date ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE head_stock SET head_stock_item_out='Y', head_stock_item_out_date=CURDATE() WHERE specific_item_code = #{stockPK}
UPDATE head_stock SET head_stock_item_out='N', head_stock_item_out_date=NULL WHERE specific_item_code = #{stockPK}
UPDATE head_stock SET head_dump_whether='Y' WHERE specific_item_code = #{headDumpCommand.specificItemCode}
